---
title: "Andi Kujtan"
---

Andi Kujtan is a trained psychotherapist who is passionate about examining our inner worlds through parts work, inner child work, psychedelics, and altered states of consciousness. Andi uses a holistic approach and prioritizes creating a space that is safe, open, welcoming, and inclusive for all.

### Meeting and Cultivating Relationship With Your Inner Child

Andi will discuss the concept of inner children, and reparenting, lead a guided meditation to help facilitate meeting an inner child part, and discuss ways we can cultivate and maintain relationship with these vulnerable parts of ourselves.

[More info](https://thebranchesyoga.com/community-care/therapy#Andi).
